resources.string: With this software you agree to be bound by the following terms.
No warranties of any kind, express or implied are given.

You, the person installing this software, accept full responsibility for anything that occurs as a result of any persons using this install of this software, and agree not to hold RexxLA liable for anything whatsoever.

You understand that while this software has been tested, it has not been mathematically proven and is thus unsuitable for use in any situation where failure of this software may result in injury to persons or financial loss. You agree not to use the software in any such situations.
You agree that if any part of these terms are invalid then the remaining terms still hold.
The default calculations will be in US units unless you check the box beside the word Metric.
From your testing, Soil Test units will be the recommended amount of N-P-K to apply in lbs / acre for US or kg / hectare for Metric.
Length and Width are in feet for US and meters for Metric.
From your testing, compost N-P-K units are in percent of content.
f you did not test the compost, you may use the default values provided by clicking the button on the bottom left.
Calculations are based on first year availability of nutrients.
For very small areas, Results * Ton will give you the amount of lbs or kg needed.
xample in US units : 1 US Ton equals 2000 lbs.
Example in Metric units : 1 Metric Ton equal 1000 kg
